attributes.action: Ban Domestic Energy Assessor Training Centres from advertising DEA Shortage & Sensational Earnings.Too many .No work. No Money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Domestic Energy Assessor at the start in Sept 2007. Ruth Kelly said "We need more DEAs to train. We've 2,000 need 8,000"
However now theres 15,000 far too many. Training centres advertise "Government urgently need more DEAs, wages of £65,000. Join our busy panel. Lies Please ban this advertising. 
No room in industry for newly trained DEAs all openings full with standbys waiting. 
People being mis-sold career opertunities on expensive courses 
Our wages have dropped to minimum wages due to too much competition. 
Only people earning is Estate Agents and panels  who take half our earnings. 
Ban cold calling Companies offering secure patches / franchises for £2,000 +  then pack up with no fee payment for our EPCs sent to them.
Set a National minimum fee for DEAs at £50 per EPC. 
Regulate DEAs EPCs more rigorously through accreditation bodies. Get rid of cheap rubbish inferior DEAs.
